thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 17 of 3563
thread.title: Tolana

author: Tolana
title: Tolana
text:
Books are shipped in a plastic envelope without any padding. It's just a plastic bag, really. And they put in as many as will fit -- I've received as many as 6 in one plastic bag.
This means that books WILL get damaged in the mail -- dings to corners and edges at the least. All my packages showed evidence of scraping, and in some cases had tiny holes from the scrapes. One book I got had a dent to the spine with a corresponding hole in the bag.
I'm never buying from Thriftbooks again.
